data.sentence: The word حُبًّا comes from the root ح ب ب and is associated with the meanings: To love, like, wish.

data.meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.
data.sentence: The word الْمَالَ comes from the root م و ل and is associated with the meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.
The word وَتُحِبُّونَ comes from the root ح ب ب and is associated with the meanings: To love, like, wish.

data.meanings: To be much or abundant, to be many, full or filled, let collect, draw near, come to pass, to recover [such as from fatigue], to relieve or rest, to be indinstinctive, conceal or not reveal a thing, hold back or not dare to do a thing, run again after any run, to go much, to be satiated or satisfied [such as with food or drink], greater or greatest in quantity and in number.
data.sentence: The word جَمًّا comes from the root ج م م and is associated with the meanings: To be much or abundant, to be many, full or filled, let collect, draw near, come to pass, to recover [such as from fatigue], to relieve or rest, to be indinstinctive, conceal or not reveal a thing, hold back or not dare to do a thing, run again after any run, to go much, to be satiated or satisfied [such as with food or drink], greater or greatest in quantity and in number.
